| --- |
| Abnormal ocular motility |
| Carboplatin chemotherapy |

Note: "Abnormal ocular motility" is not a disease in the classical sense, but rather a symptom or a condition. However, it is still a valid entity in the context of the paragraph, as it is being reported as a clinical experience.
